```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

```{r}
ces <- read_csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>%
  clean_names
```

```{r}
# Creating a basic ggplot demonstrating the white population vs. CalEnviroScreen pollution burden score

ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white_percent,
                       y = ces_3_0_score)) +
  geom_hex() +
  labs(x = "Percent White", y = "CalEnviroScreen Pollution Burden Score") +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "peachpuff", high = "red4") +
  theme_minimal()
```
